评论详情: This hoodie is stylish, comfortable, and warm. I normally wear an extra small/small, but I decided to size up to a medium since I have a long torso. I’m glad I did. Even though it’s an oversized hoodie, it is short. The material is also very thick and looks like it will last a long time.

I did wanted a white zip up hoodie more on the cropped side I did have find the one.  It is thick so is very warm and it’s a truly a nice white color.  The fabric is really soft and nice but as I mentioned in my video you need to wash it before wearing it because it lints.  I did the video as soon as I got it out of the package and it didn’t have any funny smell or anything out of the ordinary. It came well package.  It is really true to size. For reference I am 5’8” and I weight around 145 and 150 pounds and I ordered it in a size medium because I wanted the oversized look. Bit I could fit in a size small as well. I love the little holes to put your thumbs. The zipper is well made and I think it will last.  I used it mostly as I cover up to and from the gym (mostly because I spent my day in sports clothes) I do recommend and I will be buying more colors in the future.

评论概述: Soft but weird fit and color
评论详情: Gave this hoodie for stars because it was super soft and had potential to be super cute. I was really excited about this one but it just for me weird. I’m 5’8”, 190lbs, 38c and ordered my usual size Large for reference. The pockets on this were sitting at my chest rather than the stomach/waist. The coffee gray color was also more like a dirty looking light pink. So between fit and color, I will be returning.

评论概述: Perfect length for a short human
评论详情: This hoodie fits in all the right places, in all the right ways.  I have been looking for one that is soft, thick, and cotton.  Love the style, love the color, love the fit, love the zipper, love the higher neck, love the details.  Everything about this is quality.  Thank you for filling a hole in my hoodie void!  From a horse farm manager (work outside 13 hours a day no matter the weather or holidays) who lives in hoodies in the frigid/hot midwest.

I grabbed one of these on a limited time deal, and was so impressed that I have now bought several. Very soft and thick, keeps you toasty and comfy. It's just cropped enough to be cute, but not ridiculous..if that makes sense. Colors are cool and the stand up collar is great if you're like me and hate a cold neck. Have even gotten them as gifts. You won't be disappointed, go for it.

评论概述: Do not trust the size chart
评论详情: The sweatshirt is nice (thick, soft, well-made) but the *length* on the size chart is off by about 2 inches, which is a lot. This is a CROPPED sweatshirt (as it says in the description, but not the name). Since I was ordering an XL and am only 5'2", I relied on the size chart, but that was substantially off from the actual product measurements. Two inches is the difference between something that hits at low-hip versus high-hip, and for me, flattering versus not. I am passing this along to my daughter. I would give this 5 stars if the length matched the description, because it really is a well-made item, and a good value for the discounted price that I paid. Unfortunately, the length makes this unwearable for me.
My granddaughter lives this hoodie. It is heavyweight and very pretty. Fits is on point. Very warm and comfortable. Has some stretch.

I'll admit that I was skeptical 🤔. But...the hype is legit! This hoodie is so flattering and comfy. It is surprisingly great quality with that thick squishy feel. The zipper down or up is cute. The grey green color looks luxe and creamy. I'm on a fitness/weight loss journey and currently at 209lbs, ordering a XL. It is perfectly oversized. I know it will still look great the more I lose. Now...to avoid my toxic trait to order multiple colors in something I love. 😬***The only tiny negative was that the plastic zipper ends had sharpe unfinished edges that scratched my neck. I used my nail grinder to buff it and all better. I hope it doesn't shrink in the dryer.

Love everything about this sweater, exactly what I was looking for. It is a bit short but not completely cropped. Has thumb holes, good quality material and fit me perfectly. Only problem is I think I was sent one that was returned. I noticed the plastic it came in already had a hole and didn't think anything of it until I found a used tissue in the pocket. (Pictured) Looked like it was only used for makeup. Not a huge deal as nothing else seems to be wrong and I can wash just didn't expect that after already trying it on.

Super quality!  I love the slighly faded coloring. Oversized and comfortable,I sized up just to have the loose feel. The fabric is a cozy  thick cotton. Zipper glide is smooth. I like the thumbholes in the wrists to hold sleeves in place when using the front pocket. Definitely will buy again, might try in another color just for fun.
I love the fit of this jacket. The size and length works better for me than lululemon. The color choice is wide and it doesn’t fade when being washed. Into down side is that it may not be as soft.

评论概述: Great Sweat shirt for post workout
评论详情: I needed a sweat shirt for post workout when it’s the uncomfortable cold-sweat time before you jump in the shower. This is a great shirt for that. The zipper opens so it doesn’t hit my pony-tail, has pockets to keep my hands warm, or carry my phone and keys, and looks cute. It’s comfortable and I would recommend to others.

I bought this for my picky 14 year old granddaughter for Christmas. I don’t think she’s taken it off since she got it! 😂 The quality and style are on point., the softness of the fabric is unbelievable, it stretches, but not too much. The zipper is functional and I might have to get her another one in another color so this one can be washed! 😂

When I originally bought this, I was not aware for some reason it had a hood on it. It was a pleasant surprise because I actually like it with the hood. The inside is comfy and the fabric is thick which is nice in the cold weather
Warm and comfortable, compliments when I wear it. It is on the shorter side, I ordered a small would get a medium next time.

The feel is soft and very comfortable. Definitely will be wearing this a lot. Only issue is the length, it’s shorter than expected especially if you plan to lift your hands over your head. It fits right at the waist, no longer than that. Sleeve length was perfect.

This sweatshirt is so soft and comfortable. It is fuzzy in the inside and is actually maintaining that soft, fuzzy interior after several washes (and machine drying). The color is beautiful (greygreen) although a little more minty than I was expecting. I love this one so much I just ordered a second in another color. It’s thick enough to be warm, the pocket is large enough for my phone and keys and stocked high enough that they don’t slip out when moving around or bending over the way some of my sweatshirt pockets let me down. I really love how a simple sweatshirt looks feminine. And- thumb holes. Nuff said. It’s a 10 from me- I love this sweatshirt!
Normally wear small. Ordered small. Fits perfectly oversized without swimming in it. Color is fun. How can you not get for $25?? Just do it.
Super comfy, I've received a lot of compliments.  It does shrink up quite a bit in the dryer so be careful of that and follow the laundering directions.
I sized up and it is super comfortable and oversized
I have two of these in different colors. They are thick and great quality! Definitely a Lululemon dupe.

Cute sweater but I thought it was an oversized fit. I ordered a small and it fits, I just wanted the oversized look instead of a cropped look. I also feel like this may shrink in the wash. Will be returning and ordering a bigger size.
This product is the superior lulu dupe and the only one you need! It fits perfectly and is so soft and high quality for the price! I have it in two colors, so far.

评论概述: So soft and comfortable. Love it!
评论详情: This sweatshirt is very soft and comfortable.  Bought a Lululemon Scuba one (which this is a copy of) for multiple times the price of this one.  It runs slightly shorter than the name brand.  This item exceeded my expectations.  I bought several more in different colors.  Only thing to beware of is that some colors are a little different as pictured.  This particular one is just like as shown in product picture.

It is thicker than I normally expect from Amazon, so very cozy! I got a medium because I didn’t want it to be too oversized and I love the fit. The color is a little off from the picture. I got the coffee, but looks more tan but I don’t mind. Only thing is the sleeves are a tad bit short for the thumb holes to be comfortable, so maybe should have gotten a large but overall very happy with it.

评论概述: This style is so close to the big name brand that no one would ever know!
评论详情: I love the sweatshirt! It looks almost identical to the expensive athletic name brand - It’s almost uncanny! I would highly recommend this sweatshirt. It’s heavy weight, but not too hot and looks extremely cute on! I especially appreciate that the sleeves are a bit long because I can’t stand it when shirt sleeves are too short 😁
I love this sweatshirt so much. It's so cute and warm. I love the hood and the length is flattering. This pink is the perfect pink.

Beautiful color and weight to fabric.  I have very short arms but can not use the thumb feature as too short sleeve to use that... otherwise on a very  short girl this is very warm and cozy. Hood is a bit akward and bulky but I will be wearing this often as the cold weather sets in.
I LOVE this sweatshirt. It's soft, comfortable, and is true to size. This is my third one and I still love the comfort!

Beautiful color . Thick material hood on shirt is very heavy and bulky . I sized down normally medium ordered a small . 5.5 H W 145. I returned just because material was so thick and hood felt bulky .

评论概述: I’d wear this every day if I could!
评论详情: It’s perfectly cozy and flattering to boot. I will have to buy in multiple additional colors to better achieve my goal of wearing this always.
Very comfy addition, went with a L for an oversized fit. I’m 5’3” and 150 lbs. It’s nice material and kept me warm in sunny 39 degree weather. This is a staple for the PNW winters!
Bought this as a gift for my 14 yo grand daughter.  I think it's great,  God only knows what she will think.  Check back with me after she opens her Christmas presents.
My favorite color, and cute style. Comfortable.
What a great sweatshirt.  Pretty thick and warm.  Was very disappointed however that the zipper broke in the wash the first time.
Good quality! Warm , thick, and looks good. We love these!
This pullover exceeded my expectations. It’s very thick and well made. Now I need all the colors.

I really like how thick and high quality this hoodie feels. These days, a lot of clothing tends to be "Temu" quality (thin, cheap, poor quality), but this hoodie is not that! It is a very thick weight fabric and has stood up well to multiple washings (and I'm not gentle with washing or drying, I absolutely punsh my clothes and overdry them lol). I get compliments everytime I wear it about how "cute" it is. I'm 5'4", 110 lbs and the small fits great (not too tight and not oversized).

评论概述: Comfy fit, mid crop, thumb holes
评论详情: Their sizing recommendation was on point! The fit is so comfortable, the inside is so comfy as well. I didn't know there were thumb holes, but im glad to know now! Get it, it’s so comparable to those name brands.
Super flattering and warm with a nice oversized hood that covers your whole head.
Very comfy

Love the softness and comfort and it is true to size: however the mid length shown on the models in the pictures don’t necessarily reflect the actual length upon arrival.  It is more so a mid waist length versus what shows in pics.  Great quality though!  I have purchased two already!!
The look is so adorable…fit my good friend beautifully!  She loves it!!!
The quality was good however there were three stain marks. 2 on the right shoulder and the neck area.  It can be washed but it was sloppy

Bought this in a large because other tall girls said the sleeves were long and was absolutely ecstatic waiting for it to arrive. I cant put into words the excitement I felt as I'm tired of buying mens clothes and looking like a brick in boxy designs and drab colors. Never have I ever felt so crushed pulling something out of the package. One look and I immediately knew it wouldn't fit. Tall girls be warned the sleeves were still an inch too short. I tried it on and the thumb holes dig into my skin. Any movement exposes my wrists. I'm devastated!!!!

评论概述: Warm & cozy, but odd design compared to other top name brands
评论详情: First of all, I washed these, I bought two different colors, because they came shrink-wrapped and were a wrinkled mess, so unwearable. I washed in cold and hung dry. They pilled but now they are not wrinkly and smell nice at least. The crop is nice. I am 5', 6", so it hits me in the correct waist turn spot. I love the overall warmth and coziness and will wear these in the Minnesota winters outside for sure! The sleeves are rather clown-like and pooly designed with no taper going down to the tight cuff so it bunches up awkwardly and feels and looks uncomfortable. There is just way too much fabric used in the sleeves and it didn't have to be that way. I'll stick to JOYLAB for looks, quality and price (much cheaper on sale, 100% cotton).

This gray half-zip hoodie is a cozy, stylish staple that feels just like a Lululemon piece, but at a fraction of the price. The fabric is soft and warm yet breathable enough to keep you comfortable during workouts or casual outings. The fit is relaxed, and the oversized hood is perfect—it provides full coverage without messing up your hair.  I get tons of compliments every time I wear it. Whether worn with leggings or jeans, this hoodie is both comfortable and styleish, making it a great addition to any wardrobe.
These are great Cropped but not insanely high Perfect at hip or right above hip
I really like this hoodie. It is slightly weighted which I really enjoy. It is warm but not too warm. It arrived on time.

Super soft. It is the perfect dupe for a certain lululemon sweater. The zipper is not fabric protected like the Lululemon one so the zipper is slightly irritating on the face when zipped fully. It is thick and warm.

The sleeves on this were far too short for me—by about three inches!  The garment fit me in all other ways and did feel cosy. It seemed of decent quality and I probably would have kept it if the sleeves weren’t so ridiculously short.

I bought this after buying and loving the non-hoodie version from Automet. LOVE! Nice and thick, roomy without being sloppy and not overly cropped. I’m 5’6 and currently 165/size 10 with D bust and this L fits just like in listing pic. Crop hits right at my natural waist or a touch below. Cute boxy look but can raise my arms, too.
Just as pictured. good quality material and comfortable.
I love the feel and the color! If you want it to be longer I would size up!

Love it! I ordered the light green while it was on sale and totally worth it. Normally a M, but I sized up to a L for a baggy fit/didn’t want it to be too short. Prob would have been fine with a M since they are oversized. Buy it!! Best lulu dupe
Nicely made, not as warm as I thought it would be but still pretty nice

The Pocket in the front is large and the hood is big too! The color is a rich black with a nice soft, good thickness good for laying and styling. No smell. The size is right on as long as you know it’s a short hoodie.
Shirt color is nice and it is a good weight.
Soft and cozy

I bought this sweatshirt for my grandma actually. She needed something warm for the trips in and out of the hospital and this seemed to look very comfortable. It is very warm and great material. The color is perfect and super pretty.

I’m a big Lululemon girl, so I was curious to try this one to see if it was similar quality for a much more affordable price. This sweater delivers! It is very similar to the Lululemon scooba hoodie for a fraction of the price. I love the color, it’s thick and the material is soft. The quality rivals Lululemon and if you’re on a budget (or not) buy this one! I’ll likely buy more colors!
Super cute sweatshirt! fits true to size and super soft!

评论概述: So cute & not super short cropped
评论详情: I sized up since I wanted the crop to be slightly longer and this is my favorite sweatshirt of the winter…I’ve been wearing it every single week
This zip up fits perfect and is very thick and warm !

This top is great. It is a bit cropped but still flattering. The material is soft and I would classify this as a heavy weight material. Love the colors available. I ordered two already! I ordered a medium and I usually wear a large. It is still has the oversized look but still looks great!

Let me start with the good. I ordered 2 of these and they’re super cute in style and function. Both are very thick and fluffy to wear which will keep you warm in the cold months. The colors (both unwashed at this point) are exactly as I expected them to be and I hope they stay that way, one reviewer noted after washing all of the color faded. The hood fits over my head and stays even with my hair in a ponytail or a bun, not a lot of hoods have that much extra material in them and I see this as a plus. They are cropped but not excessively so, they hit me right at my hip bones for the back and just about an inch above in the front. Cropped is cute but too short and you loose the function of the sweatshirt and living just outside of NYC, well… we need warmth in the winter but we want fashion too. These give you both! Now for the bad…. The sizing is inconsistent. The arms on the coffee color I ordered are about a half inch shorter on each side than the green one. I did order both in the same size and checked to make sure they sent both in the correct size. Normally this wouldn’t be a huge issue but if I plan to use the thumb holes in the coffee color I can’t because this has now made the sleeves too short and literally cuts into my thumbs if I move my arms from anything but a bent position. I did size up for extra room, something I often have to do as I have longer arms and the green is perfect. Also the thumb holes on the coffee color are cut ever so slightly smaller than the ones on the green version. Overall it feels like the coffee is labeled wrong and is a size smaller than listed on the tag. Will I keep them? Yes! Do I love the color and style? Yes! Do I wish the sizing was more consistent? Also yes! In the end I am keeping them and we shall see how they hold up once they’re run through the washer but I don’t think I’ll be ordering more considering the regular price was above $50. Although I did catch them on sale so this can go in the list of pluses, the company does run sales.

I really like this sweatshirt.  Its the perfect comfort shirt for fall weather.  It IS short  .. not really a crop top but sits just at your waist.It is very soft and I love the thumbholes.  The front has a quarter zip, so the hood doesn't sit too high up (oddly important when you have long hair).  I'm 5'3" , 110lbs and bought the medium which fits well.  I"m going to order another color and will order the same size.I have a couple lululemon scuba hoodies and find this to more comfortable.  I've only washed it once so far so hopefully it holds up!
I am a small woman 5’3 130 I got a size medium and it’s still oversized but very cute. I love the color. Definitely a good purchase

评论概述: Good dupe for the price - but size up
评论详情: I ordered this as a throw on for before/after the gym since I walk there and to take the dogs out in the morning since we have milder winters where I live and a full on jacket is just too warm. So far it’s doing the trick! I always liked the look of the Lululemon Scuba but just have never been able to justify the price of it. This dupe here I can totally get behind though, especially if they are running any type of discount like when I purchased. I may even purchase a second color. It’s definitely warm enough (i tend to run very warm) and while the construction isn’t perfect, it’s good enough for the price.  The Grey green color is definitely more sea foam green than what the picture advertises but still very pretty. It just shows EVERYTHING. Any little droplet of water that hits this thing shows, so that isn’t the best. Also, in general I would size up. I could have done a large through the width of the waist, chest, and shoulders but it would have been too short in the waist. And oddly enough, I feel like the sleeves run a little short. The thumb holes are great but don’t align quite how I would want them to. But still, for the price, I’m happy.
Super comfy! Very great quality! Although, the neck part is a tad bit uncomfortable but overall it’s great!
I ordered two in different colors and the dyes were weak and the quality felt cheap. They’re not luscious like they look in the photos

I bought this for a recent trip to wear on the plane and it is now my favorite hoodie. It is so flattering, thick, warm, and comfy. It has held up well to washing (cold water and hang dry) I love the thumb hooks on the sleeve and that it has a hood.
If you have a bigger chest, this will sit in a weird spot. Other than that i love it

评论概述: Love the fit, but not as much stretch
评论详情: First, I really like the color and the warmth of this sweatshirt. I purchased a medium and it fits great with just a tad more room. I had thought from previous comments that this sweatshirt would have a little more stretch to it. It really does not. But it is warm and cozy.

I really like this. The big plus for me is the quality which is better than I expected. It really is soft inside and it keeps me pretty warm. The powder blue color is beautiful. I’m so happy that the cropped style is back. From the waist down I’m built like a man- belly bigger than hips and I look ridiculous in tunic tops. I’m 5’5, 130lbs and the large fits best.

I thought this as a scuba dupe and I love it. It’s a little thicker than the scuba, which is nice if you live in a colder climate. It’s really soft on the inside and stays soft after a lot of washes. Definitely worth the money

I love this!! The color is great, fits true to size (5'6" and 160lb) It's not too heavy but not super lightweight either I'm in tx so it's perfect, love that it has a hood but sits like a 1/4 zip. Couldn't say enough good, just buy it
This sweater is exactly as described very soft and warm I got it in a size medium and it fit me perfectly . Sleeve length is great I love the thumb holes . I will buy other colors
Bought this in a small and I love it! If you want a bigger fit I would definitely size up! It’s super cute. I will be buying more!
Super cute but more of a crop top feel even when sizing up.

This is the perfect fall/winter hoodie and has become a staple for me. It is true to size and has a perfect fit - not too tight but not too over-sized. I have worn it casually to run errands, to the gym, around the house. You can wear it by itself or layer it with a vest. Quality is amazing and holds up after a few washes. I have had a few of these for at least over a year now & it still looks brand new. I have at least 3 and will probably buy in another color for this fall/winter. If you're thinking about buying just do it!

I love this hoodie! Feels so much more expensive than the price. Super soft! Love the cropped fit but the arms are long enough. I got this in the mail a few days ago and have barely taken it off. Already ordered a second color.

评论概述: Way to short and easily shrinks
评论详情: I loved the color and thickness of the jacket, as well as the pocket. However, it was more “cropped” or short compared to most jackets like this so I ended up returning it which was disappointing because other than that it was cute!
I wanted something comfy to wear to school and outside and this is it! It's not too oversized and it's soft inside. The only thing the color is off, it's a little lighter than the picture
I was super happy with this jacket it hits at the perfect spot and the sleeeves aren’t too long. The cuffs are a perfect size too and the thumb hole is really nicely placed. My new fave jacket
I rarely buy clothes that I actually like from Amazon but this is perfection. It feels like the same quality as vuori but so much less expensive and with longer sleeves.
Great hoodie, thick material that will be great in cooler weather. It took some time to decide between a M and L because I like an oversized look, but ended up choosing the M for overall better fit.
In love! Great quality, soft & comfy! Not super heavy but definitely a great material. True to size. Feels like a name brand without the high price tag!
I was really looking forward to this hoodie. LOVE the color, but it’s crop top and because there is a hood it pulls it higher and the zipper ends up irritating your neck.
This hoodie was just ok.  There wasn’t anything about it that wow’d me.  I know it’s a sweatshirt but the color and quality were just a little blah.  Otherwise true to size.
Nice hoodie, but the zipper scratches your neck when you zip it up which is annoying.
This sweatshirt is so comfortable and cute!!! Great fit, style, softness, and colors! I have it in 3 different colors and have my mom and sister hooked as well!
I took this on a Europe trip with me and it was so great as my travel hoodie, while being warm and stylish!
My teen loves the feel, shape, and color.
Way shorter than expected. When it says oversized I was thinking it would be longer as it looks long on the model. It’s comfy but just wish it were longer.
Love this hoodie. Very soft, fits well.

I recently got this 3/4 zip hoodie, and it's quickly become my go-to for comfort and style.  The fit is perfect, especially if you have a long torso like me. It’s long enough to provide great coverage without riding up. The sleeves are also nice and long, which is a huge plus.  The material is super soft and cozy, making it perfect for lounging or running errands. Plus, the cute design adds a nice touch to any casual outfit. Highly recommend! For reference I’m 5’8 & 145 lbs. I ordered the medium!

This hoodie so soft and perfectly oversized. I’m 5 foot 115 lbs. The quality is great. It is thick and so comfortable. I wore it pretty much everyday of my first trimester until my belly started to take shape. I own 4 colors and I intend to order more.

I've purchased several items from this brand. The quality is great.  I love the color and overall fit of this hoodie. The inside is super soft and the zipper feels durable and strong. Would recommend!

Edit: took stars off because the sleeves have shrunk significantly after 1 month. The sweatshirt has only been washed and dried 2-3 times but the sleeves are about half an inch shorter. Will probably return the other 2 I purchased since this one is 2 days outside of the return window.  Had to buy 2 colors because I want to wear this sweatshirt every day. Will probably get one or two more. Love the cropped fit and quarter zip.
